text: Woh din ke andar raat ko aur raat ke andar din ko pirota hua le aata hai.Chand aur Suraj ko usne musakkhar kar rakkha hai. Yeh sab kuch ek waqt-e-muqarrar tak chale jaa raha hain. Wahi Allah (jiske yeh sarey kaam hai) tumhara Rubb hai, baadshahi usi ki hai usey chodh kar jin dusron ko tum pukarte ho woh ek parekaah (skin of a date-stone) ke maalik bhi nahin hai
